```{r}
scecap <- read.csv("SCECAP_data.csv")
impervious <- read.csv("impervious_prct_cover.csv")
scecap

impervious

imperv_huc12 <- subset(impervious[impervious$HUC_DIGITS == 12,])
imperv_huc12_upland <- subset(imperv_huc12[imperv_huc12$UPLAND == 2,])

plot(imperv_huc12_upland$PRCT_IMPERV ~ imperv_huc12_upland$YEAR)

boxplot(scecap$BIBI_CP ~ scecap$YEAR)

hist(imperv_huc12_upland$PRCT_IMPERV, breaks = 20)

```
